global.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete it?

keywords.title: Manage keywords and categories
keywords.alert_json_file_is_not_valid_bad_format: json file is not valid , some keywords are missing name property.
keywords.alert_must_be_added_to_category: categories and tags can only be added to another category
keywords.alert_can_not_add_category_to_its_self: You can not add category to its self
keywords.alert_can_not_move_category_to_subcatego: You can not move category to its subcategory
keywords.alert_must_be_one_root_category: There has to be at least one root category
keywords.alert_tag_already_exit_in_category: tag with that name already exists in category: '{{parent}}'
keywords.alert_can_not_add_tag_or_subcategory_wit: error you can not add tag or subcategory without parent category!

dialog_modify_category.alert_category_name_is_whitespace: name only contains whitespace (ie. spaces, tabs or line breaks)
dialog_modify_category.alert_category_name_is_empty: You can not submit empty name.
dialog_modify_category.alert_tag_already_exit_in_selected_categ: tag with name '{{name}}' already exists in selected category.
dialog_modify_category.alert_category_already_exit_selected_cat: category with name '{{name}}' already exists in selected category.
dialog_modify_category.alert_cannot_add_category_to_non_categor: you can not add category to non category object
